9001.name: Pursuit
9001.effect: Chase after the opponent and inflict double damage if the target switches out.

9002.name: Feint
9002.effect: Attack the opponent and ignore evasion moves such as Dodge or Guard. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

9003.name: Revenge
9003.effect: Wait 1 turn then deal double the damage taken on next turn.

9004.name: Shadow Claw
9004.effect: Slash the opponent with a claw made from shadow. This move has a 10% critical hit chance.

9005.name: Shadow Sneak
9005.effect: Sneak in the dark and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Light typed moves during this turn.

9006.name: Sucker Punch
9006.effect: Strike the target with a surprise punch before they can attack. This move has a +2 priority and only works if the target is about to use a move.

9007.name: Midnight Raid
9007.effect: Attack the target using the surrounding darkness. This move deals 50% less damage under the sun, but has a 50% chance of landing a critical hit when used at night.

9008.name: Eclipse Strike
9008.effect: Strike at the opponent with the borrowed power of eclipse. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

9009.name: Phantom Force
9009.effect: Surround the body with a swirl of dark energy then strike at the opponent. This move has 20% chance of lowering the target's Attack stat.

9010.name: Void Crush
9010.effect: Crush the target with immense dark energy from the void. This move has a 30% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

9011.name: Dread Wave
9011.effect: Unlease a wave of dread on an opponent. This move has a 10% chance of paralysing the target.

9012.name: Dark Pulse
9012.effect: Emit a pulse of dark energy at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of lowering the target's Special Defense.

9013.name: Umbra Beam
9013.effect: Fire a concentrated beam of darkness. This move has a 20% chance of causing confusion to the target.

9014.name: Nightmare
9014.effect: Haunt the sleeping opponent. This move only works if the target is asleep.

9015.name: Sinister Shade
9015.effect: Embrace the opponent with a wave of sinister energy. This move has a 20% chance to lower either the target's Special Attack or Special Defense stat.

9016.name: Abyssal Wrath
9016.effect: Release the hidden power from the abyss at the opponent. The user will have their Defense and Special Defense stats harshly reduced before using the move.

9017.name: Glare
9017.effect: Frighten the target with a scary face to lower the target's Speed stat.

9018.name: Stalk
9018.effect: Stalk the opponent, allowing the next move to have +1 priority and 50% critical hit chance.

9019.name: Provoke
9019.effect: Taunt the opponent, causing the target to only be able to use attack moves for three turns.

9020.name: Taunt
9020.effect: The user draws attention to itself, making all opposing opponents take aim only at the user.

9021.name: Reprise
9021.effect: For the next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used.

9022.name: Blackout
9022.effect: Plunge the area into darkness. This move lowers the Accuracy stat for everyone around the user, foes and allies alike.

9023.name: Shadow Veil
9023.effect: Envelop the user in shadows. This move raises the user's Evasion stat.
